item.title: How to watch NFL Week 17: free live streams, TV channels, schedule for Judgment Day
item.description: All the ways to watch NFL Week 17 live streams online from anywhere for FREE, as the Baltimore Ravens, Detroit Lions and Tampa Bay Buccaneers face elimination.

item.title: Une enveloppe généreuse à un mini prix : ce forfait 5G propose 150 Go à moins de 10 €/mois
item.description: Si vous êtes un gros consommateur de données 5G, mais que votre budget n'est pas extensible, surtout en cette fin d'année 2025, le forfait mobile actuellement proposé par Auchan Télécom pourrait bien vous convenir. Chez ce MVNO, les 150 Go de 5G coûtent seulement 9,99 euros par mois.

item.title: Sealy Promo Code: Save $200 on Mattresses This Month
item.description: Whether you’re switching from springs to memory foam or just want to sleep cooler this summer, these Sealy mattress deals will have you waking up refreshed—and with cash left in your wallet.

item.title: 5 of the hottest jobs in 2025
item.description: 2025 was the year of AI, and these jobs saw a surge in demand, according to a leading IT staffing firm. In 2025, AI became officially unavoidable: It had been lurking in the background before, as early adapters experimented with it. But this year, companies invested more than $202 billion in AI, a 75% increase from $114 billion invested in 2024. Major tech companies fought bitterly over AI talent, offering astronomical pay packages....
